column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////This location is pretty small
column2: when we walked up the place was literally bursting at the seems with people waiting to be seated.  Since the pizza takes 40 minutes to cook
column3: they ask you to place your pizza order while you wait.  Which we did
column4: and then we went to get drinks at the bar.  Luckily for us
column6: right when we walked up so we scored seats right away.  Bartenders were slammed
column7: but still friendly and immediately alerted the hostess we were now at the bar.
